article.name: Free Colours
article.description:
Colours are free!
Not the most attractive colour palette in the world. Maybe someone can find a use for it.
I think I\'ll go and watch a HD-DVD now...
That last #C0, it could be \'red\' if you make it #C00000, but I figured if its a single value, then it should be a grey value with equal RGB channel distribution.
